attributes.action: Buy a dictionary and look up the word 'debate'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After promising a 'full debate' on various matters from ID cards to Trident it can only be assumed that the PM thinks 'debate' means 'do what I think'
Perhaps he could look up 'god complex' as well.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
